from gpt_researcher import GPTResearcher import asyncio
async def main(): """ This is a sample script that shows how to run a research report. """ # Query query = "What happened in the latest burning man floods?"
# Report Type report_type = "research_report"
# Initialize the researcher researcher = GPTResearcher(query=query, report_type=report_type, config_path=None) # Conduct research on the given query await researcher.conduct_research() # Write the report report = await researcher.write_report()
return report
if __name__ == "__main__": asyncio.run(main())
